title: Twitter Q&A with President Rajapaksa from New York
content: FILE PHOTO – Mr. Lalith Weeratunga is on a Twitter Q&A session President Mahinda Rajapaksa will answer questions on a Twitter Q&A from New York following his address at the 68th session of the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA). President Rajapaksa is scheduled to deliver his address on the afternoon of Sept. 24. The Twitter…
